Package mx.unam.fciencias.sky

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Filter
    Defines the services associated with the methods to distinguish clouds and sky.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cleaner
    This class provides the services needed to crop the whole image to obtain the square where the actual sky picture is.
    Convolution
    Defines a filter based on the red/blue ratio for each pixel.
    RGBFilter
    Defines a filter based on the red/blue ratio for each pixel.
